## DataViewJSTools class

Decorator class to provide additional functionality related to RSS to dataviewjs queries.

```svgbob
┌───────────────┐      ┌─────────────────┐
│ ~~~dataviewjs │      │                 │
│ dvjs....      │─────▶│ DataViewJSTools │
│ ~~~           │      │                 │
└───────────────┘      └─────────────────┘
        │                       │
        │                       │
        │                       ▼
        │               ┌───────────────┐
        │               │               │
        └──────────────▶│ Dataview API  │
                        │     (dv)      │
                        └───────────────┘
```
The arrows indicate the direction of interaction, showing that a `dataviewjs` interacts with the `dataview` API through the [DataViewJSTools](./rss-tracker.dataviewjstools.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class DataViewJSTools 
```

## Methods

<table><thead><tr><th>

Method


</th><th>

Modifiers


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[fromTags(page)](./rss-tracker.dataviewjstools.fromtags.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Generate a dataview FROM expression to get pages matching a tag filter.

The required frontmatter properties to build the expression are: - `tags`<!-- -->: pages with any of these tags are included - `allof`<!-- -->: pages must have all of these tags to be included - `noneof` - paged with any of these tags are excluded


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[rssCollectionTable(collections, expand)](./rss-tracker.dataviewjstools.rsscollectiontable.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Render a table of RSS collections.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[rssDuplicateItems(item)](./rss-tracker.dataviewjstools.rssduplicateitems.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Get duplicate items which link to the same article


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[rssFeedDashboard(feeds, expand)](./rss-tracker.dataviewjstools.rssfeeddashboard.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

<tr><td>

[rssItemTableByFeed(items, expand)](./rss-tracker.dataviewjstools.rssitemtablebyfeed.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Render a table of RSS items grouped by feed.

\*\*Note\*\*The expander control is labeled with the feed name.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[rssReadingList(items, read, expand, header)](./rss-tracker.dataviewjstools.rssreadinglist.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Create a collapsible list of reading tasks with on-demand rendering.

If the given feed has no reading tasks which have the state matching the `read` parameter, no UI is generated.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[rssReadingListByFeed(items, read, expand)](./rss-tracker.dataviewjstools.rssreadinglistbyfeed.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Display collapsible reading tasks grouped by feed.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[rssReadingTasks(items, read)](./rss-tracker.dataviewjstools.rssreadingtasks.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Get a list of reading tasks for the given RSS items.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[rssTopicTable(topics, expand)](./rss-tracker.dataviewjstools.rsstopictable.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>
